assignments.name: 3. Techniques for Selecting Artwork
assignments.description: We learned how the selection tools work in illustrator, especially objects and anchor points. We also learned how to change the colors of things and adjust the positions of things

assignments.name: 4. Make a Logo with Shapes
assignments.description: We learned how illustrator's shape tools. We learned how to make basic2 shapes, make stars, round rectangles, and more.

assignments.name: 5. Editing and Combining Shapes and Paths
assignments.description: We learned about the pathfinding and shape combing tools illustrator offers. We also learned about making our own curves.

assignments.name: 6. Character Creation (cat)
assignments.description: We continued to learn more about illustrators tools for making designs. We learned about illustrators layer system and how to pick colors.

assignments.name: 8. Graphic Creation Choice Project 1
assignments.description: We were given free choice of what we would need to do for the project, focused on making stickers. I made two stickers with a robotics theme. They were heavy on layers and the pathfinder.

assignments.name: 9. Using Basic Drawing Tools
assignments.description: We learned the basics of the pen tool to follow a tutorial logo. It involved using curves and lines.

assignments.name: 10. Drawing with the Pen Tool
assignments.description: We learned more advanced tequniques for drawing with the pen tool. This involved more advanced used of the control points ofr curves and changing the types of some points.

assignments.name: 10B. Pen Tool Application
assignments.description: We used the pen tool to draw a meme image. I chose the sad cat. I did'nt quite finish it, but it gave me lots of practice.

assignments.name: 11. Pen Tool Self Portrait
assignments.description: I used the pen tool toc omplete a portrate of myself. This gave me a lot of practice in getting the curves I wanted out of the pen tool. I feel pretty confident with it after this.

assignments.name: 12. Using Brushes to Create an Ad
assignments.description: We used brushes to create a basic ad. This was  tutorial, but I tried different patern brushes and colors. It really gave me an insight to the brushes in illustrator.

assignments.name: 13A. Brush Exploration
assignments.description: I tried different brushes to see what they looked like. the denim seam was cool, becuase I didnt think that brushes would work like that.

assignments.name: 13. Choice (brush focused) Design
assignments.description: I used brushes to work on a covere for a BBNO$ song called "Meant to be". I think that it turned out very well, although I did not finish it.

assignments.name: 14. Adding Type to a Poster
assignments.description: This asignment tought us the basics of type in illustrator. We learned about point, block, and threaded type. It still seems a it awkward to work with, though.

assignments.name: 15. Fine Arts Festival Poster
assignments.description: We were given an opprotunity to design a poster for the PBL Fine Arts Festival. I decided to make seperate sections for the different thinks that appear at the show: Art, Music, and Comedy. I think that this design was pretty good, capturing the arts that were shown off at te festival

assignments.name: 16. Gradients, Blends, and Patterns
assignments.description: We foloowed a tutorial to learn how to work with different gradients in Illustrator. THe gradient tool works really well and I understood it a lot.

assignments.name: 17. Pictionary Recreation
assignments.description: We were given the chance to use ProCreate to redraw a sketch made in a short game. I made a 3 layer design with a night sky, grassy foliage, and the person in the front.

assignments.name: 20. Rebranding Your Business
assignments.description: I chose to rebrand the robotics company GoBILDA. I chose this company becuase its very realvent to me because I like robotics. I chose to focus on making the logo out of parts that they sell, as well as making a product advertisement and the new label for that product.
